00009 void TCustomerManagement::testFetchAllCustomers () {
00010   QString idA ("AX1111");
00011   QString surnameA ("Joanna");
00012   QString nameA ("Johanson");
00013   int groupA = 1;
00014 
00015   Customer custA (idA, nameA, surnameA, groupA);
00016 
00017   QString idB ("BX1111");
00018   QString surnameB ("John");
00019   QString nameB ("Hercules");
00020   int groupB = 2;
00021 
00022   Customer custB (idB, nameB, surnameB, groupB);
00023 
00024   CustomerManagement cm;
00025 
00026   cm.newCustomer (custA);
00027   cm.newCustomer (custB);
00028 
00029   vector<Customer> custs = cm.fetchAllCustomers ();
00030 
00031   QVERIFY (custs.size () == 2);
00032 }

00034 void TCustomerManagement::testSearchCustomerByValue () {
00035   QString id ("AX2222");
00036   QString surname ("Michael");
00037   QString name ("Johinson");
00038   int group = 3;
00039 
00040   QString key ("Joh");
00041   
00042   Customer cust (id, name, surname, group);
00043   CustomerManagement cm;
00044 
00045   cm.newCustomer (cust);
00046   vector<Customer> custs = cm.searchCustomerByValue (key);
00047

00051 void TCustomerManagement::testNewCustomer () {
00052   QString id ("AX3333");
00053   QString surname ("Malkovich");
00054   QString name ("Peter");
00055   int group = 1;
00056 
00057   Customer temp, cust (id, name, surname, group);
00058   CustomerManagement cm;
00059 
00060   cm.newCustomer (cust);
00061   temp = cm.fetchCustomer (id);
00062 
00063   QVERIFY (cust.getId ()      == temp.getId ()      &&
00064            cust.getName ()    == temp.getName ()    &&
00065            cust.getSurname () == temp.getSurname () &&
00066            cust.getGroupId () == temp.getGroupId ());
00067 }

00087 void TCustomerManagement::testDeleteCustomer () {
00088   QString id ("AX3333");
00089   Customer cust, temp;
00090   CustomerManagement cm;
00091 
00092   cust.setId (id);
00093   cm.deleteCustomer (cust);
00094   temp = cm.fetchCustomer (id);
00095 
00096   QVERIFY (cust.getId () != temp.getId ());
00097 }

00117 void TCustomerManagement::testCheckInData () {
00118   QString empty ("");
00119   Customer cust;
00120   CustomerManagement cm;
00121 
00122   cust.setId (empty);
00123   cust.setName (empty);
00124   cust.setSurname (empty);
00125 
00126   QVERIFY (cm.checkInData (cust) == false);
